rows.label: qev015201_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey there. Can I ask your help with something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0002
rows.name:
It's wonderful that we've begun living with the Ma-non.
Truly it is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0003
rows.name:
But as you probably know, any sudden surge in
population brings with it certain...problems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_JNK0010
rows.name: Gripe

rows.label: qev015201_SEL0011
rows.name:
Start ranting about how the Ma-non
are so annoying and wishy-washy.

rows.label: qev015201_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev015201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Ajoa if she's talking about a food shortage.

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0004
rows.name:
Well, that's... I mean, yes. Our races certainly have
some cultural differences.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0005
rows.name: But I think you're overlooking a more fundamental issue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0006
rows.name:
That will likely be a problem at some point, yes,
but it's rather outside of my area of expertise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0007
rows.name:
I speak of something we need just as much as food.
Perhaps even more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0008
rows.name:
...Water. New LA is looking at a huge shortage of
clean, potable water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0009
rows.name:
We're trying to build a purification plant on a lake
outside the city, but indigens are preventing us from
transporting materials to the site.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0010
rows.name:
Might I convince you to secure the route for us?
Once we can ship in the necessary materials,
the project shouldn't take long at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0011
rows.name:
Water is essential to life, and I'm quite proud to be on
the hydrology team here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0012
rows.name:
From the drinks you see everyone chugging to a hot
post-mission shower, nearly all of our daily activities
require clean water in some form.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0013
rows.name: So you can see how important this project is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0014
rows.name:
I heard the reports—excellent work!
I really appreciate everything you've done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0015
rows.name:
You cleared out the construction area as well, right?
Well, I'd love to throw a bonus your way, but perhaps
we can just call that part community service?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0016
rows.name: Sorry, but you know how budgets are...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0017
rows.name: So this is water from the site, eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0018
rows.name:
...Ugh. Again with these shoddy containers!
I keep telling them the samples need to be airtight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0019
rows.name:
I'm sure it's probably fine, but water is a critical
resource, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0020
rows.name:
The foundation of life AND civilizations—which is why
the Roman aqueducts were used for over 2,000 years.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0021
rows.name:
Well then, cheers to our new civilization!
It's okay if I pay you in water, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0022
rows.name:
Kidding! Just kidding.
I'll set the transfer up for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0023
rows.name:
I heard the reports—excellent work!
I really appreciate everything you've done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0024
rows.name:
Sounds like you helped the builders out with materials,
too. Though if you want a stipend, I'm afraid you'll
have to invoice the construction company.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0025
rows.name:
Sorry, but I don't have the clearance to authorize it.
...Or the budget, for that matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0026
rows.name: So this is water from the site, eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0027
rows.name:
...Ugh. Again with these shoddy containers!
I keep telling them the samples need to be airtight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0028
rows.name:
I'm sure it's probably fine, but water is a critical
resource, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0029
rows.name:
The foundation of life AND civilizations—which is why
the Roman aqueducts were used for over 2,000 years.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0030
rows.name:
Well then, cheers to our new civilization!
It's okay if I pay you in water, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015201_MSG0031
rows.name:
Kidding! Just kidding.
I'll set the transfer up for you.[ST:wait ]
